name: Saturday Morning (sagarara32)
description:
Prototype Studio W7 Assignment  [Game for Daniel]

・Saturday morning, you want to have a good sleep but your sister's phone doesn't want to.

・There's an Awake meter, you wanna back to sleep, before being completely awake

・WASD to move / spacebar to get up / mouse click to interact

[Back Story]

This game is based on what Daniel told me one day about his younger sister who used to ring the alarm again and again in the morning without waking up and he had to rush to her room to stop the god damn alarm.  My brother did the same kind of thing back home, so I know how it feels. However, he looked somewhat nostalgic as we laughing how annoying it was.

Now he has quiet mornings, far far from his hometown, and no one can force him to wake up.
